issue.title: Protobuf error when build catkin workspace

content.raw:
I cannot reproduce the problem and it’s difficult for us to troubleshot your local environment \(i.e. what/how packages have been installed\). Therefore, I suggest you continue using the SubT simulator docker image and just use a catkin workspace for your solution/controllers, as shown in the green box below.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2703839678-solution_ws.png)
content.html: I cannot reproduce the problem and it’s difficult for us to troubleshot your local environment (i.e. what/how packages have been installed). Therefore, I suggest you continue using the SubT simulator docker image and just use a catkin workspace for your solution/controllers, as shown in the green box below.
